name: Be Like Tim
description:
In this 2D jump n run with cut-out style, you play Tim, who is holding a flower in his hand. 

Your goal? Go through the next door - without stumbling into deadly icicles or falling into the endless abyss. Easy. 

The hook? As designers, we let go of control: you have the ability to adjust your movement speed and jump strength, both to an extent that could be called "out of control".

A note regarding Art: We did not take these photos during the GMTK Jam 2020, they are all marked as legal for commercial use. We edited, arranged and animated everything during the GMTK Jam 2020.

Made on the basis of the Unity Standard Assets package.
